title: Medical monitoring template for a visualization of count data
description: This report compute counts of variable(s) of interest (with the \code{\link{inTextSummaryTable}} package) and visualize them with a treemap and/or sunburst.

templatePackage.doc: package from which the template should be extracted

dataFileName.doc: name of the data file of interest

dataTotalProcessing.doc: data processing parameters for 'dataTotalFileName', passed to \link[medicalMonitoring]{processData}

countVar.doc: variable of data to count on

parentVar.doc: parent variable(s) of the counting variable, used for grouping

colorVar.doc: numeric variable(s) to consider for coloring, named by count/parent variable if different for each variable

colorRange.doc: color variable range for the visualization
